pages.text: The Netherite Monstrosity is a hard boss found in the soul black smith in the nether and is a tanky boss.$(br2)The monstrosity can throw bombs and cause insane knockback and should be a late game boss.

pages.title: Eye of Monstrous
pages.text: You use this eye the same way you would use an eye of ender to find the soul black smith.$(br2)He will be there waiting for you in the arena when you arive no need to summon him.

pages.title: The Infernal Forge
pages.text: The infernal forge is an item dropped by the Monstrosity and you can smash the ground to cause magma eruptions to occur.$(br2)You can combine this with the Void Core to create the Voide Forge which does the same thing but with ender magic.

The Monstrous Helm is created with a monstrous horn dropped by the Monstrosity.$(br2)This helmet knocks back all entities when you are at half health and increases regen, defencse, and knockback resistance while worn.
